def describe_job(self, job_id): """ Gets metadata about a classification job.
:param job_id: The ID of the job to look up. :return: Metadata about the job. """ try: response = self.comprehend_client.describe_document_classification_job( JobId=job_id) job = response['DocumentClassificationJobProperties'] logger.info("Got classification job %s.", job['JobName']) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't get classification job %s.", job_id) raise else: return job
